text: Sanchai and Sonchat Ratiwatana were the defending champions but lost in the first round to Gong Maoxin and Hsieh Cheng-peng. Luke Saville and Jordan Thompson won the title after defeating Go Soeda and Yasutaka Uchiyama 6–3, 5–7, [10–6] in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ==References== * Main Draw Shimadzu All Japan Indoor Tennis Championships - Doubles 2018 Doubles
title: 2018 Shimadzu All Japan Indoor Tennis Championships – Doubles
